title: [Good] Snapchat offers you control over your info.

tosdr.tldr:
Snapchat offers you control over your info & if you want to delete your account, info will also be deleted from their servers, so nothing is kept.
If you ask to delete your account, you will have up to 30 days to restore your account before they delete your information from their servers. During this period of time, your account will not be visible to other Snapchatters.
